businesses.description: Compass Wire Cloth Corporation is an ISO 9001:2008 certified fabricator of wire cloth and is a leader in the industry. Over 20 years of continuous growth, we have been on an everlasting quest for excellence. Achieving this required a comprehensive quality control program, a complete inventory of high quality wire cloth, and offering our customers fast, dependable service. In 2002, we built a 65,000 SF, state of the art, fabrication facility in Vineland, NJ

Since 1835, McLanahan Corporation has provided custom engineered processing solutions for a wide variety of mineral processing applications. Their highly skilled staff designs, manufactures and services equipment used for crushing, screening, feeding, breaking, washing, classifying, dewatering, scrubbing, sizing and more.

Polydeck Screen Corporation has been an industry-leading supplier of screening solutions since 1978. From their state-of-the art manufacturing facility in Spartanburg, South Carolina, they supply polyurethane and rubber screen panels, custom frame designs, and screen accessories to the coal, aggregate, and mining industries throughout North and South America.

Powerscreen is an expert in the design and manufacture of mobile crushing equipment and mobile screening equipment.</br>Galvanising global resources, decades of experience and in-depth industry knowledge to bring to the market a comprehensive product portfolio for the quarrying, mining and recycling industries.</br>Powerscreen products operate in the toughest environments and feature nominal set-up times, market leading productivity rates and excellent reliability.</br>Powerscreenâ€™s worldwide network of over 120 local dealers ensures that we deliver unbeaten customer support; from ensuring you get the right parts first time, to experienced field engineers should you need them. Our robust and reliable machinery aims to increase your productivity and efficiency.
